SEO.title: Humanimal
SEO.description: Humanimal explores natural well-being through sport, nutrition and mental health. Discover scientific advice and personal experiences for a healthier and balanced life.

HomePage.title: Become a Humanimal!
HomePage.subtitle: A scientific approach to a healthier life, based on reliable data and current research. Access quality information to make informed choices in matters of health.
HomePage.subtitle2: Unite the human and the natural for a perfect balance between performance, health and happiness. Discover how to harmonize your personal aspirations with a healthy lifestyle.
